title: Genetic differences of Vibrio bacteria strains 3

content.question: Provide reasoning to show how the results of the study support the claim that cooperation among Vibrio bacteria can increase the fitness of some individual bacteria living in a natural environment.

frqParts.text: Provide reasoning to show how the results of the study support the claim that cooperation among Vibrio bacteria can increase the fitness of some individual bacteria living in a natural environment.

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
